Casser 2D U-Net¶

sota_implementations.casser_2018.casser_unet.U_Net_2D(image_shape, start_filters=16, dr_rate=0.2, optimizer='adam', lr=0.0005)[source]¶

Create 2D U-Net.

Copied from https://github.com/mpsych/mitochondria

Parameters

  • image_shape (2D tuple) – Dimensions of the input image.

  • start_filters (int, optional) – Feature maps to start with in the first level of the unet. It will be doubled on each downsampling.

  • drop_value (float, optional) – Dropout value to be fixed.

  • optimizer (str, optional) – Optimizer used to minimize the loss function. Posible options: sgd or adam.

  • lr (float, optional) – Learning rate value.

Returns

model – Model containing the U-Net.

Return type

Keras model
